{"blocks":[{"key":"18jks","text":"Using a knife, slice   into even chunks, transfer to a saucepan on low or medium heat and heat until melted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"280","error":false,"guid":"25149640642011EC8ABBD5D948064518","id":0,"label":"Unsalted Butter","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

This can be done with a wooden spoon, whisk or by hand as the mixture will be quite thick.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ur1a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"570","error":false,"guid":"2813B000642111EC8ABBD5D948064518","id":0,"label":"cut Chocolate Bars","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgoc6","text":" Add 8 ping-pong sized doughballs to a baking tray lined with parchment paper.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bbkg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jgu7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o2ln","text":"If baking from fresh, bake in the oven at 180oC for 8-10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":45,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gn4r","text":"If baking from frozen, bake at 180oC for 15-20 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":34,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ttf3","text":"Shape the dough into small ping-pong ball spheres.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78mel","text":"Mixed dough can either be baked on the day or covered and frozen as 4 doughballs in a freezer bag at -20oC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":104,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6108b","text":"Let the cookies sit for approximately 5 minutes, this is to both allow them to cool and to set.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f798r","text":"Use a small spoon to press in a dimple on the top of each ball.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d3u38","text":"Enjoy cookies with some milk (or a milk substitute)!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
